There is no single answer to which 2-in-1 laptop or convertible is best, as the choice will depend on your specific needs, preferences, and budget. Some popular options in recent years include:

1. Microsoft Surface Pro 7 - Known for its powerful performance and excellent build quality.
2. HP Spectre x360 - Offers a premium design with a long battery life.
3. Lenovo Yoga C940 - Features an impressive rotating soundbar speaker hinge and large display options.
4. Dell XPS 13 (2020) â€“ A versatile option with a sleek design and updated internal hardware
5. Acer Spin 5 - Provides excellent stylus support along with strong performance.

It's essential to research further based on your specific requirements and read user reviews before purchasing any device.

Just note that newer versions of these laptops might be available due to rapid advancements in technology happening all the time so ensure that you look at the latest specifications/models!
